name: Mykey
0:
”Alexa,lock the home lock”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hardware Requirements:
1. My Key smart Lock
2. gateway hub - sold separately
3. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the My Key app is able to lock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the My Key app is able to “remotely” lock using the gateway hub

3. Enable the Mykey skill in Alexa

4. Link the My Key account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Honeywell smart Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below:

Alexa, lock the home lock
(home lock is the name of smart lock,you can rename the smart lock in the My Key app)

Alexa,lock the home lock

Alexa,lock my home lock

Alexa,lock home lock
